name: Green Street Advisors (UK) Limited
membership:
European Public Real Estate Association (EPRA)
European Association of Independent Research Providers (EuroIRP)
goal: Green Street Advisors aims to be the leading independent research provider on listed real estate companies globally. Our European office focuses on the European market. We are un-conflicted: we do not engage in investment banking activities, nor do we engage in proprietary trading activities or asset management. We are fully focused on servicing our clients with high quality research and execution capabilities.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives: Markets in Financial Instruments Directive II
